heading: 2.2 PTR Campfire Chat Wrap-Up
content: It's now time to think about the 2.2 PTR update for Season 8! Blizzard just finished the Season 8 ! Read everything you need to know here! We can expect some changes to itemization: Torment Progression and Pit scaling will be adjusted: are Belial Apparition events where players have to fight waves of monsters leading up to some bosses and finally Belial itself. Each class will get a new powerful Unique Item and Legendary Aspect to magnify your renowned demon crushing prowess! We hope you enjoy the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus for the Season 7 is to make sure our are always solid with all the new item updates, new features and mechanic changes. And we're continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
